stem: Can this authenticator be both a possession and biometric factor type?
Is this a statement type that is included in a SAML assertion?
Can an Okta Administrator use this query to identify user creation events in the Okta System log?
Is this a way to receive status information and alerts on the Okta Service?

options.text: Use the Okta Org Admin API to receive Okta Status alerts
Subscribe to receive alerts from the Okta Community page

stem:
An Okta Administrator has integrated a third-party application to their company's Okta org.
Is this what the administrator must do to enable automatic updates of an Okta user attribute in the application?

options.text: In Profile Editor, enable update user attribute in the application and map the attribute to the application
Map the attribute from the application to Okta

stem: Is this a true statement about configuring Okta FastPass?

options.text: An Okta Administrator must create a new password policy for Okta FastPass
All versions of Okta Verify are compatible with Okta FastPass
An Okta Administrator needs to configure a Global Session Policy for Okta FastPass
An Okta Group must be created that includes all users who will be using Okta FastPass

stem:
An Okta Administrator is running the Okta Active Directory (AD) agent installer to install the AD Agent on a domain joined server.
Is this the minimum AD user account permission required to run the installer?
Is this a true statement about what happens when an Okta account is suspended?

options.text: An Okta administrator CANNOT perform profile updates on the Okta account
All application assignments are removed and the password is permanently deleted for the Okta account
The Okta user can sign in to Okta to access applications
The Okta user CANNOT access their applications or the Okta End-User dashboard. Their application assignments are unaffected and their user profile can be updated.

stem: Is this a true statement about Global Session Policy persistent cookies?

options.text: If a user quits their browser and reopens the browser, the browser session is persisted unless the user has signed out.

stem: Is this what happens when a user launches a Service Provider (SP) initiated application from the Okta Dashboard?

options.text: The user will be Just-In-Time (JIT) provisioned into the application
The user will be assigned to the application
The user will receive an error from the downstream application
The user will be signed out of Okta

stem: Is this a browser that the Okta Browser Plugin does NOT support?
Can these base Okta user profile attributes be set to be "optional" or "required" for Okta sourced users?
Is this a supported option for Okta Verify number challenges?

options.text: Only for high risk sign-in attempts

stem: Is this a true statement about search filters in the Tasks dashboard in Okta?

options.text: Tasks can be filtered by users
Tasks can be filtered by application
Tasks can be filtered by authentication

stem:
An administrator needs to use Okta to control application assignment based on user profile attributes.
Is this what the administrator needs to configure?

An IT professional wants to ensure that attributes for the Okta user profile are properly mapped to various applications.
Does the following action achieve this goal?

options.text: Verify directory and application profile mastery
Verify a mapping between the Okta user profile and the app user profile

stem: Is it appropriate to use Agent-based Provisioning in an environment that has following service or element?

options.text: G Suite used for email and calendaring
An on-premises Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) service

stem: Is the following statement a valid reason for selecting Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) over Secure Web Authentication (SWA)?

options.text: SWA applications can be configured to authenticate without the use of passwords
SAML is standards based and allows for interoperability among multiple vendors
SWA applications are not required to use HTTPS for secure password submission

stem:
An IT professional is configuring several SaaS applications for access by directory-mastered users who use form-based authentication.
Which authentication method is appropriate for this scenario?
Is this attribute required when creating a new Okta mastered user account?
Is this a true statement about the functionality available to Okta end users?

options.text: Okta end users can deactivate their accounts
Okta end users can modify the arrangement of application icons on their dashboard
Okta end users can enable auto-launch for dashboard applications
Okta end users can upload a photo as their security image
Okta end users can modify their username
Okta end users can change the Okta user interface display language

stem: Does the Okta Mobile app allow an end user to do this?

options.text: Notify the user of incoming emails through Okta apps
Access web applications through Okta Single Sign-On (SSO)

stem: Does this multifactor authentication (MFA) type provide strong and effective resistance against man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks?
Is this a required step to integrate Okta with an LDAP directory?

options.text: Install and configure the Okta LDAP Agent

stem:
An end user is experiencing an issue with the Okta Browser plugin.
Is this the first step an administrator should take to troubleshoot the issue?

options.text: Review the dashboard in the Okta Administrator application
Verify the Okta Browser plugin is enabled
Review the service history at trust.okta.com

stem: Does this statement correctly describe how the Okta Integration Network (OIN) is used in the Okta Service?

options.text: OIN apps are available to all Okta customers
All applications in the OIN have been integrated by Okta and been tested by Okta engineers
The OIN contains information about whether an application supports provisioning
All apps in the OIN support SAML
Applications can be added to the OIN by the Okta community

stem:
Company policy dictates that multifactor authentication (MFA) is required when accessing corporate applications.
Is this an Okta-provided MFA option?
Is this what an administrator must do to integrate Okta with an application that supports federation but is NOT in the Okta Integration Network (OIN)?

options.text: Create a Secure Web Authentication (SWA) application
Clone and modify a similar application from the OIN
Create a SAML application using the Application Integration Wizard (AIW)
Request that Okta add the application to OIN

stem:
The Active Directory (AD) administrator of a company wants to integrate its directory services with Okta.
Will the following action provide redundancy for delegated user authentication?

options.text: Install two or more Okta AD Agents on separate domain member servers

stem:
The IT department has determined that all new employees will receive access to Office365, Concur, and Workday applications on their first day of work. Some employees in specific deparments additionally require access to the Skytap, WebEx, and Asana applications, depending upon their job role.
Can an employee use this Okta self-service option to gain access to the three additional applications?

options.text: Change settings on their homepage to allow IT to directly add the new applications
Create an application task in the end-user home page
Email the IT deparment asking for access to the applications
Make an application request via +Add Apps feature

stem: Is this a true statement about attribute mappings?

options.text: Attribute always have to be mapped
Attribute can be applied on user deactivation
Attributes can be applied when creating or updating users

stem: Is this a method of configuring groups within Okta?

options.text: Importing an LDAP Data Interchange Format (LDIF) file

stem: Is this the policy to implement if an administrator needs to ensure that end users are prompted for multifactor authentication (MFA) when they attempt to log in to Okta?

A company has recently deployed Okta and set up many web-based corporate applications to use Okta Single Sign-On (SSO). Prior to the Okta deployment, user access was managed through Active Directory (AD) users and departmental groups. More than 5,000 users and departmental groups were imported from the AD domain into the Universal Directory. Given this set of conditions, is this the proper method for granting access to an Okta-connected order management application for all users in the accounting department?

options.text: Import the AD group into the accounting application
Assign the imported AD accounting group to the application
Enable AD group provisioning in the accounting application

stem: An administrator needs to create a rule to enforce multifactor authentication (MFA) for only the Microsoft Office 365 application and NOT for the entire Okta org. Is this the policy the administrator should create?
Is this what happens when an Okta Administrator changes the theme of an Okta org?

options.text: Theme of the Okta Administrator Application changes
Theme of the Okta end user dashboard changes

stem: Is this a valid user status?

An Okta Administrator is configuring a cloud application from the Okta Integration Network (OIN) so that the following User Lifecycle Management functions are enabled: Create, Read, Update, and Deactivate.
Is this a true statement?

options.text: When an Okta user is unassigned from the cloud application, Okta automatically deprovisions a user profile from the cloud application.
When an Okta user is unassigned from the cloud application, Okta purges user history from the application logs
When an Okta user is assigned to the cloud application, Okta automatically creates a user profile in the cloud application

stem: A member of the IT team is setting up authentication for Office 365 within the Okta Administrator Application. Company policy dictates that users are not required to input a separate password when accessing this application. Will the following configuration support the company policy?

options.text: Configure authentication using Secure Web Authentication (SWA)
Configure an application user profile for Office 365
Configure authentication using Web Services Federation (WS-Fed)

stem: Is this an Okta feature you can use to automate application assignment to directory-mastered users?

options.text: Use Okta Mobile instead of a password reset
Visit okta.com/password to initiate a reset
Use Okta Verify instead of a password to gain access
Select the Forgot Password option from the log on screen

stem: Is this the Okta support offering that provides a customer with a named Customer Success Manager (CSM)?
Is this an example of an identity and access management (IAM) feature provided by Okta?

options.text: Policies for enforcing sign-on behavior, multifactor authentication (MFA), and password complexity
Active Directory (AD) integration that allows users to authenticate through Okta
Multifactor authentication (MFA) into Okta and into applications protected by Okta

stem:
A user cannot remember their credentials for a Secure Web Authentication (SWA) app.
Does this feature in Okta help a user retrieve their credentials?

options.text: The user creating the token must be enrolled in multifactor authentication (MFA)
The token is only visible during creation

stem: Is this statement about profile mastering in Okta true?

options.text: It defines which Create, Read, Update, Deprovision (CRUD) actions can be performed in an application
It defines where the profile is created and maintained
It defines where the Okta user profile's attributes will be derived

stem:
A help desk employee notices that when users are assigned to the Sales group in Okta, the new Salesforce accounts for the assigned users are not being automatically created in the Salesforce application, as expected.
Will this action correct the issue?

options.text: Turn on Attribute-level Mastering and enable [Create user name, Update user name, and Deactivate user name] for the Salesforce application user profile
Import users from the target application and enable Profile Master for the Salesforce application
Apply an application-level sign-on policy to the Salesforce application
Turn on the [Create User, Update user, and Deactivate user] provisioning features for the Salesforce application.=

stem:
A company is discussing how to integrate its current IT infrastructure with Okta and with cloud applications using the Okta Integration Network (OIN). The company wants to completely centralize the application authentication process and eliminate the need to manage passwords.
Will the following authentication method ensure that these goals are met?

A customer opens a support case and the technician assigns it as a severity level of P1.
Is the following an example of a situation that warrants security level P1?

options.text: Users authenticate to Okta but are receiving random 'Page Not Found' errors
A service interruption is affecting multiple users and preventing access
All users are receiving a 'Page Not Found' message during authentication
A critical business application is inaccessible by all employees

stem: If the system is properly configured, is this an action that an Okta-mastered user can perform without the aid of an administrator?

options.text: Create a custom Forgot Password question
Upload a custom security image from a personal photo library
Add a custom field to the user profile

stem:
A company's IT department is integrating its Active Directory structure with Okta. For convenience, directory-mastered users must have the ability to change their Active Directory passwords within Okta. Although the AD user accounts are being successfully imported into Okta, users are unable to change their passwords.
Is the following condition preventing users from changing their passwords?

options.text: An Okta Active Directory Service Account has not been created yet

stem:
A company decides to increase Okta org security policies by applying stricter password policies for both employees and for Okta administrators. Additionally, the company wants Okta administrators to use Okta Verify as a second factor.
Is this the correct way to order groups in the Sign-On Policies?

options.text: Employees group nested inside Adminsitrators group
Administrators group and Employees group at the same level

stem:
Employees in a company's marketing department share access to several social media accounts that require usernames and passwords.
Is this the authentication method that should be used to configure shared access to these applications?

options.text: Run the SAML Capable Apps report
